V1.5.9: - Additional fixes for 32 bit and pre-iOS 9.3 devices V1.5.8: iOS 10 Support Fixes for 32 bit devices New welcome screen Added long press actions back (overriding icon editing (jiggle) mode) Quick shortcut actions will be hopefully working on iOS 9 again Fixed folder opening twice on swiping up/ down. Thanks to: michyprima Quick action is now working on iOS 10 on the first app or the folder. All crashes (related to 3D touch) on iOS 10 fixed. Fix some glitchy animations while swiping and using force touch at the same time Better method to hide the initial folder icon when opening a folder with force touch V1.4.2.2:
Fix 3D touch preview when ClassicFolders is enabled
Unfortunately, still not working perfect with ClassicFolders
Fix centering folder previews
Fix unhighlighting icon (thanks to: Ettension)
Stock 3D touch animations
Some optimalisations and bug fixes


V1.4:
* HUGE UPDATE! Set custom folder actions/ display options for each folder!!! (See settings > Set per folder settings).
* New method: open last opened app
* New method: choose to open up the last app in the folder
* New method: choose to open up the 3rd, 5th, or 99th app (and all in between)
* Compatibility with BioProtect!
* Better animations on opening and closing folders
* Fixed display glitch when opening up folders
* Fixed folder preview on iPadv * Fixed shortcut menu showing up twice
* Finally solved the status bar issue after 3D touch
* Nested folder previews are working now! (See settings > Nested folder behavior)
* Better compatibility with Anchor inside folders
* Fixed issues with other short holding tweaks such as Appendix, Manila & Exsto on pre-3D touch devices. (Therefore the option 'enable/ disable editing mode on a long press' was removed. From now on, a long press will always invoke editing mode )
V1.3.0:
* iOS 9.3 support!!
* Added an option to invoke editing mode on a long press. (ENABLED by default!)
* Added a Double Tap timeout slider.
* Swipe down quick action, no longer removes the status bar (update to 9.3 if you still have issues)
* Nested folder support (no icon support yet)

Coming soon:
- Choose to open up the 3rd, 5th or even the last app in the folder (and all in between) as an action.
- BioProtect support
- BlurryBadges support
- Nested folder icon view
V1.2.2:
* iOS 8 hotfix

V1.2.1:
* Compatibility with Anchor
* Fix for moving folders in editing mode was a little bit hard
* Fix for 3D touch method won’t work after folder was moved
* Fix for folder animation opening twice when a folder is opened with 3D touch
* Fix compatibility with QuickCenter when a 3D touch action is set
* Yes, even nested folder support (folder preview not working yet)
* Better support for Quick Action when it is set to the Swipe Up gesture.

V1.2:
* Swiping Down gesture!
* 3D touch fixes
* Appendix/ Manila fix (set 3D touch gesture to 'Nothing\’)
* New option to close folder automatically
* Right preference icon size @3x

V1.1:
* Fix DoubleTap issues
* Hide Grey Folder Icon Background (Folders as full size icons)
* Quick action on other gestures
* Full iOS 8 compatibility
* Manilla and Appendix compatibility
* MultiIconMover(+) compatibility
* QuickCenter compatibility
* Cydia icon
